item.title: treeio: Base classes and functions for parsing and exporting phylogenetic tree
item.description:
The treeio package defines classes and functions for parsing and exporting phylogenetic trees. treeio is released within the Bioconductor project and the source code is hosted on GitHub. Authors Guangchuang Yu, School of Basic Medical Sciences, Southern Medical University.
Citation treeio was splitted from ggtree package, please cite the following article when using treeio:

item.title: Documentation
item.description: Vignettes Importing trees with data Exporting trees with data ggtree for tree visualization and annotation Blog posts object conversion convert graphic object to tree object using treeio
